dataValueTemplate.annotation: select count(distinct p.person_id) from openmrs.person p, openmrs.obs o, openmrs.encounter e where p.voided = 0 and o.voided = 0 and o.person_id = p.person_id and o.encounter_id = e.encounter_id and 5 >= (IFNULL(YEAR(e.date_changed),YEAR(e.date_created)) - YEAR(p.birthdate)) and o.value_coded = 161749 and Date(o.obs_datetime) >= :startOfPeriod and Date(o.obs_datetime) <= :endOfPeriod and e.location_id = :locationId

SELECT count(*) from ( SELECT p.birthdate,v.patient_id,v.location_id,min(v.date_started) as date_val FROM openmrs.visit v,openmrs.person p where p.person_id = v.patient_id GROUP By v.patient_id ) s where 5 >= (YEAR(s.date_val) - YEAR(s.birthdate)) and Date(s.date_val) >= :startOfPeriod and DATE(s.date_val) <= :endOfPeriod and s.location_id = :locationId

SELECT count(*) from ( SELECT p.birthdate,v.patient_id,v.location_id,min(v.date_started) as date_val FROM openmrs.visit v,openmrs.person p where p.person_id = v.patient_id GROUP By v.patient_id ) s where 5 < (YEAR(s.date_val) - YEAR(s.birthdate)) and Date(s.date_val) >= :startOfPeriod and DATE(s.date_val) <= :endOfPeriod and s.location_id = :locationId

select count(*) from openmrs.visit v,openmrs.person p where v.visit_id NOT IN ( select q.visit_id from ( SELECT v.visit_id,min(v.date_started) as date_val FROM openmrs.visit v GROUP By v.patient_id ) q) and p.person_id = v.patient_id and 5 >= (YEAR(v.date_started) - YEAR(p.birthdate)) and Date(v.date_started) >= :startOfPeriod and DATE(v.date_started) <= :endOfPeriod and v.location_id = :locationId

select count(*) from openmrs.visit v,openmrs.person p where v.visit_id NOT IN ( select q.visit_id from ( SELECT v.visit_id,min(v.date_started) as date_val FROM openmrs.visit v GROUP By v.patient_id ) q) and p.person_id = v.patient_id and 5 < (YEAR(v.date_started) - YEAR(p.birthdate)) and Date(v.date_started) >= :startOfPeriod and DATE(v.date_started) <= :endOfPeriod and v.location_id = :locationId

SELECT count(distinct o.encounter_id) FROM openmrs.obs o, openmrs.person p where o.person_id = p.person_id and concept_id = 161257 and 5 >= (YEAR(o.obs_datetime) - YEAR(p.birthdate)) and Date(o.obs_datetime) >= :startOfPeriod and DATE(o.obs_datetime) <= :endOfPeriod and o.location_id = :locationId
